name: ReSolutions LLC
tag_list: social-responsibility, socially-responsible, corporate-responsibility, corporate-social-responsibility, social-marketing, environmental-consulting, business-social-responsibility, corporate-green, environmental-marketing, green-advertising, business-susta
overview:
ReSolutions is a business sustainability consulting firm that helps businesses cut through the green clutter to make them more strategic and profitable, and build brand equity.

ReSolutions is centered around four business areas:

Sustainability Consulting There is economic and social value in corporate sustainability programs. Our job is to help you find it. By using the ReSolutions ProcessTM, we help companies large and small find opportunities for cost savings and competitive advantage through environmental performance. We help build sustainability into business strategy.

Corporate Sustainability Reporting Institutional investors are looking to invest in the strongest companies. Demonstrate your strength. Sustainability reporting is a vehicle businesses use to discuss their economic, environmental and community goals and progress. The reporting process provides transparency and accountability for organizations savvy enough to have a sustainability commitment.

Green Programs & Projectcts This includes projects such as Brownfield site redevelopment, educational programs, or even an environmental or community initiative that needs the leadership and assistance of experts? ReSolutions staff have spent fifteen years communicating environmental programs. We work with you to plan the program, and we can pull all the elements together.

Green Marketing ReSolutions has the expertise to develop and implement an internal or external marketing program. Our professionals can work with you on all the pieces, from printed and online CSR reports to advertising and direct mail for green programs.
